eligibility_rules: ['Applicants must be companies registered in Hong Kong']
evidence_spans: ['The Government provides matching funding', 'Each approved project may receive funding up to HKD 15 million', 'Applicants must be companies registered in Hong Kong']
text:
Re-industrialisation Funding Scheme: The Government provides matching funding.
    Each approved project may receive funding up to HKD 15 million.
    Applicants must be companies registered in Hong Kong.

evidence_spans: ['Exports of advanced semiconductor equipment require prior license approval', 'from the relevant authority']
text:
Exports of advanced semiconductor equipment require prior license approval
    from the relevant authority.
